remarks: Atoms are preserved by the map defined by ~ df-mapd .  Property (g) in [Baer] p. 41.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mapdat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdat.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdat.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
mapdat.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdat.b $e |- B = ( LSAtoms ` C ) $.
mapdat.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdat.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
mapdat $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` Q ) e. B ) $.
